definition[0]: a hard dry type of bread in small flat shapes, that is often eaten with cheese
definition[1]: a decorated paper tube that makes a small exploding sound when you pull it apart. Crackers contain a small gift, a paper hat, and a joke, and are used at Christmas in Britain.
definition[3]: something that is very good or funny
example[0]: That was a cracker of a goal.
definition[4]: someone who illegally breaks into a computer system in order to steal information or stop the system from working properly
